To avoid delays while using MIUI+, connect both devices to the same Wi-Fi network.
To avoid delays while using MIUI+, connect both devices to the same Wi-Fi network.

Welcome to Mi Smart Hub! You can use this app to cast screen content, transfer multimedia playback across devices, use Mi Smart Play, MIUI+, and app handoff. This app needs to connect to the internet and requires the following permissions to be able to work normally:
For transferring audio playback to connected devices
Access and save items to storage
For sending and receiving transferred files
Access and save items to storage
For transferring items and connecting devices via Wi-Fi
For transferring items and connecting devices via Wi-Fi
Read and agree to our <txt href=\"%1$s\">User Agreement</txt> and <txt href=\"%2$s\">Privacy Policy</txt> before you continue.
Looks like the other device is transferring files now. Wait until the transfer is finished and try again.
This device only supports opening two windows at the same time
You can open up to 3 windows in this version

MIUI+ allows you to seamlessly switch between devices when you need to edit the photos taken with your phone on your tablet. Turn on Wi-Fi to use handoff?
MIUI+ allows you to seamlessly switch between devices when you need to edit the photos taken with your phone on your tablet. Turn on Wi-Fi to use handoff?

Welcome to %s! Our app provides the following services:
Connecting phones and tablets using your Xiaomi Account
Viewing and using smartphone apps on your tablet
Before using %1$s, read and agree to our <txt href=\"%2$s\">User Agreement</txt> and <txt href=\"%3$s\">Privacy Policy</txt>.

Ongoing transfers will be interrupted if you end the session now. End anyway?
Looks like your phone and tablet are using different Xiaomi Accounts. To transfer items, sign in to the same Xiaomi Account on both devices.

To connect the devices, Wi-Fi and Bluetooth should be turned on on the other device too. Check whether connection for the other device is allowed in Settings > Connection & sharing > Connected devices and try again.

To connect the devices, Wi-Fi and Bluetooth should be turned on on the other device too. Check whether connection for the other device is allowed in Settings > Connection & sharing > Connected devices and try again.

"Couldn't connect to computer. Make sure you've turned on Wi-Fi and Bluetooth on both your phone and computer, and that your computer is running MIUI+."

Welcome to MIUI+ Beta! You can use this app to connect your phone to a computer and combine two devices into one working station.
For connecting devices and transferring files using Wi-Fi
For connecting devices and transferring files using Wi-Fi
For finding computers nearby and transferring files
For redirecting audio playback to your computer

Welcome to MIUI+! You can use this app to combine your mobile devices into one working station. MIUI+ allows you to use the apps from your phone on your tablet, answer calls on another device, use shared clipboard, transfer items, and cast screen content.
For transferring audio playback to another device during casting
Update MIUI+ on your computer to connect
"Looks like Scanner isn't installed on your device. Install Scanner first."
Stop sharing your screen to be able to transfer items. Stop sharing now?
To be able to find devices nearby, turn on Bluetooth first. Turn on now?
Open Mi Smart Share on your computer and select \"Screen Combo\". You can download Mi Smart Share from www.miui.com.
Scan the QR code on the computer screen with your mobile device. You can use multiple system apps (e.g. Scanner, Camera, Mi Browser) to do that.
Copy text on your phone and paste it on your computer, add images, and sync edits in your documents.
Drag and drop items to transfer them to and from your device.
Just bring your phone close to a previously connected computer to connect again automatically.
Silence notifications when your device is connected to a computer
Combine your phone and computer into one working station
"Screen Combo places a copy of your phone's screen on a connected computer, allowing you to transfer files and interact with your mobile device there."
"·Bring a phone signed in to your Xiaomi Account near this device's NFC module to share screen content or transfer the items selected in File Manager or Gallery."
·You can view the list of compatible devices here: %s
